title: iOS Developer(6 months-3 Years Experience) | Pune
tagsAndSkills: Rest Api Design,Ios Framework,Swift,XCode,Cocoa Touch,Ios Development,Objective C,Framework
jobDescription:
Job Summary

We are looking for an iOS developer responsible for the development and maintenance of applications aimed at a range of iOS devices including mobile phones and tablet computers. Your primary focus will be development of iOS applications and their integration with back-end services.


Responsibilities and Duties

Responsibilities:

  • Design and build applications for the iOS platform
  • Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications
  • Collaborate with a team to define, design, and ship new features
  • Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs
  • Help maintain code quality, organization, and automation

Skills:

  • Proficient with Swift and Cocoa Touch
  • Experience with iOS frameworks such as Core Data, Core Animation, etc.
  • Experience with offline storage, threading, and performance tuning
  • Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect iOS applications to back-end services
  • Knowledge of other web technologies and UI/UX standards
  • Understanding of Apples design principles and interface guidelines
  • Knowledge of low-level C-based libraries is preferred
  • Experience with performance and memory tuning
  • Familiarity with cloud message APIs and push notifications
  • Knack for benchmarking and optimization
  • Proficient understanding of code versioning tools
  • Familiarity with continuous integration

Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications

Qualification: MCA, MCS, BCA , B.E,B.Tech ,MCA ,M.Tech

title: Grievance Redressal Manager
tagsAndSkills: Grievance Redressal,Grievance Handling,Escalation Management,Escalations,Management,Handling

ambitionBoxData.Title: ICICI Lombard General Insurance Company Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
Job Location: Mumbai - Malad , Navi Mumbai - Vashi


Role & responsibilities


  • Needs to manage customer complaints escalated to senior management, website grievance redressal channel and IRDA
  • Should be able to coordinate with different teams and resolve complaints within TATs prescribed
  • Should be comfortable and confident when interacting with senior officials of different teams whose intervention might be required in the course of resolution.
  • Must necessarily get into transactions and bring about the sense of urgency that is required for resolving escalated cases.
  • Should be able to identify and highlight process gaps found in the course of resolution (essentially meaning should be hands on in doing a detailed root cause analysis & manage the fix as well)
  • Maintain MIS and do analysis, prepare customized analytical reports
  • Should have good oral and written communication skills. Should have good presentation skills.
  • Must be proficient in English.

Desired Qualification:
Graduate / Post Graduate / MBA (Any discipline)

Desired Experience:
Minimum 2 years experience in customer service profile. Out of this 1 year/6 months mandatory - insurance industry experience

Personality Traits:
Excellent communication skills, ability to handle sensitive situations, strong interpersonal skills, eye for detail


Interested candidates can share the CV at apeksha.pawar@ext.icicilombard.com

title: Senior Software Engineer
tagsAndSkills: C#,.Net Core,Web Api,Azure Cloud resources,.Net Framework,T-SQL,OOPS,ASP.NET
jobDescription:
We at Lionbridge hiring for Sr. Software Engineer role.

Interested candidates kindly send your resumes on mayura.joshi@lionbridge.com OR WhatsApp your profile on 9152163602


Position Summary
Senior Software Engineer / Developer
Total Experience 5-8 + years
Location Airoli, Mumbai

About the Role
Lionbridge is seeking a Senior Software Developer (.Net) to support our global team. Lionbridge partners with brands to break barriers and build bridges all over the world. Unit testing and refactoring is the norm in your day-to-day development activities. Educating and mentoring less skilled team members should come naturally.

Experience: 6-8 + years

What You Will Do

  • Designing process automations using C# and Microsoft .NET framework and various system's APIs.
  • Creating and modifying code using APIs from specification, performing unit tests, fix defects.
  • Analysing and designing solutions.
  • Coordinating requirements gathering with other teams/functions.
  • Estimating development effort and ensuring about its correctness.
  • Coordinating development work during project lifecycle.
  • Preparing and delivering life-cycle documents as required by project.
  • Ensuring timeliness.
  • Managing quality of deliverables.
  • Suggesting changes to development process and driving its implementation.


To Be Successful You Will Have

  • 8+ years experience in software development according to development standards.
  • Working knowledge of C# and Microsoft .NET framework, .NET Core, MS SQL Server, T-SQL.
  • Ability to write technical specifications, recommendations, and development documentation.
  • Good knowledge of Object-Oriented Design and Analysis.
  • Good knowledge of Entity Framework, WEB API,
  • Experience with Azure Cloud resources.
  • Knowledge of ASP.NET (MVC5)/ASP.NET Core development will be considered as an advantage.
  • Knowledge of Kubernetes and Docker.
  • Very good knowledge of English, both in speech and writing.
  • Strong analytical and communication skills.
  • Ability to prioritize the workload and to work to deadlines.


Lionbridge partners with brands to break barriers and build bridges all over the world. For over 25 years, we have helped companies connect with their global customers and employees by delivering translation and localization solutions in 350+ languages. Through our world-class platform, we orchestrate a network of passionate experts across the globe who partner with brands to create culturally rich experiences. Relentless in our love of linguistics, we use the best of human and machine intelligence to forge understanding that resonates with our customers clients. Based in Waltham, Massachusetts, Lionbridge maintains solution centers in 24 countries.
All qualified applicants will receive consideration without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or protected veteran status.

Interested candidates can email resumes to Mayura.Joshi@lionbridge.com


Regards,

Mayura Joshi

Executive - Recruitment

Lionbridge, India

Email : Mayura.Joshi@lionbridge.com

WhatsApp Contact : 9152163602
